pages.text: As a first experiment, we are going to breed some chickens. To breed a chicken, right click 2 chikens with $(item)seeds$(), they will make hearts appear and come closer, afterwich a new chicken is born. In the first encolsure you can find $(l)Black$() and $(l)White$() chickens. Try breeding 2 chickens of the $(l)same color$()? What color would you expect the child to have?
